name: Project Hybrid (itch)
description:
Project Hybrid is a combination of two projects, Block Breaker and Laser Defender, that are part of the Complete Unity Developer Course. Block Breaker is comparable to Breakout and similar games, while Laser Defender is comparable to Galaga and similar games.

Use the left mouse button to select menu options. Controls, objectives, and win/lose conditions for both games are mentioned on their respective About menus.

NOTE: A few UI elements are slightly out of place (most likely a resolution-related issue), but the game should be otherwise functional.
